name: Retribution: Universal Requiem
description:
A free-to-play game built from the ground up, based on the the style of games people like while adding desired features for this style of game. Retribution: Universal Requiem is a 3D based space PVP game with multiple game modes rather than just TDM and instead offers many more fun and quirky game modes.

This game is constantly under development, however it is a very small team handling the updates so please bear with us as we add more features and details. You can also visit our Facebook Page and have your own input or leave it here on the community page for our consideration.

With a lot of flexibility and customization available and coming soon, for example:
  • Multiple Ship Designs
  • Multiple Ship Classes with differing stats
  • Colour Customisation
  • Customisable Upgrades

With features such as:
  • Complete Dynamic Level Generation, no one will learn where you can hide!
  • Numerous game modes
  • Private Party Games
  • Server-based Multiplayer
